name: TC_11.01.07.01_01 | Testing button [1. Create your account] in block [Steps trading]. Bid:11.01.07.01_01-fr.gb.Auth
description:

descriptionHtml:

statusMessage: AssertionError: Bug # 10. Loaded page with https://capital.com/fr/diversification-definition url, but expected the Trading platform inLive mode(timeout=15c)
statusTrace:
self = <US_11-01-07-01_Glossary_of_trading_terms_test.TestGlossaryItems object at 0x7f3fb02be1e0>
worker_id = 'master'
d = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="f75d32439f76c56f2af8f118946733dd")>
cur_language = 'fr', cur_country = 'gb', cur_role = 'Auth'
cur_login = 'test001.miketar+1@gmail.com', cur_password = 'Qwer1234-!@#$'
cur_item_link = 'https://capital.com/fr/diversification-definition'

    @allure.step("Start test of button 'Create your account' in 'Steps trading' block")
    @pytest.mark.test_01
    def test_01(
            self, worker_id, d, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password, cur_item_link):
        """
        Check: Button [1. Create your account] in block [Steps trading]
        Language: All. License: All.
        """
        bid = build_dynamic_arg_v4(
            d, worker_id, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role,
            "11.01.07", "Education > Menu item [Glossary of trading terms]",
            ".01_01", "Testing button [1. Create your account] in block [Steps trading]")
    
        Common().skip_if_eng_lang_and_fca_license(cur_language, cur_country)
        Common().check_language_in_list_and_skip_if_not_present(
            cur_language, ["", "de", "el", "es", "fr", "it", "hu", "nl", "pl", "ro", "ru", "zh"])
        # Common().check_country_in_list_and_skip_if_present(cur_country, ["gb"])
    
        page_conditions = Conditions(d, "")
        page_conditions.preconditions(
            d, CapitalComPageSrc.URL, "", cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password)
    
        test_element = BlockStepTrading(d, cur_item_link)
        test_element.arrange_(d, cur_item_link)
    
        test_element.element_click()
    
        test_element = AssertClass(d, cur_item_link, bid)
        match cur_role:
            case "NoReg" | "NoAuth":
                test_element.assert_signup(d, cur_language, cur_item_link)
            case "Auth":
>               test_element.assert_trading_platform_v4(d, cur_item_link)

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 

self = <pages.Capital.Trading_platform.trading_platform.TradingPlatform object at 0x7f3fb0b4d220>
d = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="f75d32439f76c56f2af8f118946733dd")>
test_link = 'https://capital.com/fr/diversification-definition', tpd = False
tpi = False, trade_instrument = ''

    @allure.step("Checking that the trading platform page has opened - ver 4")
    def should_be_trading_platform_page_v4(self, d, test_link, tpd, tpi, trade_instrument):
        """
        Check if the trading platform page for the corresponding trade instrument is opened
        Args:
            d: Webdriver
            test_link: Link in the list of 3 random items and start page of the sidebar
            tpd: open Trade platform in Demo mode (True). Live mode (False)
            tpi: open Trade platform for corresponding trade instrument (False)
            trade_instrument: corresponding trade instrument (False)
        """
        print(f"{datetime.now()}   Checking that the trading platform page has opened (v4) =>")
        platform_url = data["PLATFORM_URL/"]
        cur_url = self.driver.current_url
        if self.wait_for_target_url(platform_url, 15):
            self.should_be_page_title_v2(data["PAGE_TITLE"])
            self.should_be_platform_logo()
            if tpd:
                self.should_be_platform_demo_mode(d, cur_url)
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => The page with {self.driver.current_url} url was opened in DEMO mode")
            else:
                self.should_be_platform_live_mode(d, cur_url)
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => The page with {self.driver.current_url} url was opened in lIVE mode")
    
            if tpi:
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => Check that opened page with {self.driver.current_url} url for "
                      f"corresponding trading instrument '{trade_instrument}'")
                self.should_be_corresponding_trading_instrument(test_link, trade_instrument)
    
            do = True
            while do:
                self.driver.back()
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => Driver.backed")
                if self.driver.current_url == test_link:
                    do = False
    
            assert True, 'Trading platform with title "Trading Platform | Capital.com" opened'
        else:
            if tpd:
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => Loaded page {self.driver.current_url} with not {platform_url} url")
                # проверка бага для ретеста
                print(f'\nBug: {self.bid}')
                retest_table_fill(self.bid, '09', self.link)
                assert False, (f"Bug # 9. Loaded page with {cur_url} url, but expected the Trading platform in"
                               f"Demo mode(timeout=15c)")
            else:
                print(f"{datetime.now()}   => Loaded page {cur_url} with not {platform_url} url")
                # проверка бага для ретеста
                print(f'\nBug: {self.bid}')
                retest_table_fill(self.bid, '10', self.link)
>               assert False, (f"Bug # 10. Loaded page with {cur_url} url, but expected the Trading platform in"
                               f"Live mode(timeout=15c)")
E               AssertionError: Bug # 10. Loaded page with https://capital.com/fr/diversification-definition url, but expected the Trading platform inLive mode(timeout=15c)
